Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'And that... is all I had to do for this ground mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Phew... Done, at long last!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Done indeed!', 3: '7'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Excited there, huh? Say, want to hit that place we went to last time before the transport craft gets here?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I... can't say I particularly enjoy drinks with a gasoline smell.", 3: '9'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What did I tell you, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'But that look on your face just now is priceless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Let me take you somewhere a little more chill next time. People moving here from the other conservation areas want to rebuild the shopping street here, apparently.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "So it's just going to get rowdier here down the road.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You've grown to like the city vibes, I gather?", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Sure have. See, besides the guys from WGAA and those Constructs, no one knows this city better than we do.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'It\'s a shame that we weren\'t involved in the reconstruction effort from the very beginning, but I take comfort in knowing that this city that we\'re slowly building up will eventually be "home" to many.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'This street will probably be packed with people. See, this place will probably be a street with countless food stands, and there will probably be an elementary school there. And there will probably be a park up north that way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'None of these is going to happen any time soon, but I just feel like I could see all of that happening every time I stand here.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's come back here again when it's all done.", 3: '19'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Well, that's if you still remember what I just said then, of course...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "And if you don't, well, I guess I'll just have to physically help you remember.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I'll do everything I can so you don't need to...", 3: '25'}
{2: 'Speaking of which, though...', 3: '26'}
{2: 'The guy from WGAA gave me this before he left...', 3: '27'}
{2: 'As a thank you, he said.', 3: '28'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "And it's a... cassette? And what's that on the cover?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'A rock band from the Golden Age...? How in the world did they even get their hands on this thing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it supposed to be rare?', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's rare with a capital R. A friend of mine has been collecting songs by this band, and I've never seen this album before.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I've never seen a walkman like this, either...", 3: '34'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Wouldn't have imagined otherwise... Players that play cassettes just don't come by easily nowadays.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Well, I wouldn't mind giving you a hand, though, if you really want to give it a listen.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Uhm, I think you're the one who wants to listen to it, though...", 3: '38'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hell no! Get thisâ€”I'm only doing you this favor because you asked me to!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But anyhow... Come down to my dorm when we're back in Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "And it's meant as a thank you for helping me, yeah? So be there or be square.", 4: '1'}
